we are all pirates here,it doesn't matter whose material it is. If anyone don't like what a user is uploading just don't download his, hers torrents. Its as simple as that.

it's got nothing to do with theft, it's a matter of trust. i trust YIFY and their torrents. they put up the DVD cover and a summary of the film, as well as technical info. this is just lazy and stupid. would you buy a ferarri that was just a ford with a ferarri logo on it? NOPE!
